comments.body: so is this test failing as intended? the ci-bot doesn't seem to agree
we didn't make use of `result.deviation` in the test. iiuc, a higher deviation means a burst of pressue in apiserver, is it? the integrator can also be used for testing results of shuffle-sharding.
Integrator is very generally useful.  Will probably migrate to somewhere under pkt/util/

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +85,89 @@	allPass := true
	for i := range sc {
		relDiff := (results[i].average - idealAverage) / idealAverage
		passes[i] = math.Abs(relDiff) <= 0.1
		allPass = allPass && passes[i]
